remarks: A closed box in the product topology.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ptcld.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ptcld.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> Top ) $.
ptcld.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. ( Clsd ` ( F ` k ) ) ) $.
ptcld $p |- ( ph -> X_ k e. A C e. ( Clsd ` ( Xt_ ` F ) ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d F k $.
$d V k $.
$d k ph $.
